DOC.brief_summary: A randomized controlled trial comparing wake therapy (single night) followed by bright light therapy to treatment as usual.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a Single Nights' Wake Followed by Bright Light Therapy for Severe Depression
DOC.criteria: Depressive episode requiring admission to a psychiatric hospital (including unipolar and bipolar depression). Psychotic symptoms/agitation Compulsory admission Confusion Active substance use disorder Eye disease preventing bright light therapy
